text: "Peaceful Easy Feeling" is a 1972 song by the Eagles and is taken from their debut studio album Ealges. It went to number 22 in the United States and number 35 in Canada. It is one of the band's popular songs of 1972. ==References== Category:1972 songs Category:Eagles (band) songs Category:Country rock songs Category:Soft rock songs
title: Peaceful Easy Feeling
